message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I'm not comfortable going as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9000?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to go down to $9250, but I think that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9000?
